title: What Drink to Order a Gamer - Follow the Liter
description:
Welcome to our newest show Follow the Liter, where we teach you how to make fancy drinks that will impress your friends. This week, the Naughty Dog!

Get a cocktail named after you here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Erick - http://twitter.com/castrodisiac

Music by Tonedeff: https://twitter.com/tonedeff

transcript_chunks.text: what's up guys welcome to Follow the Liter the show where we teach you how to make super cool drinks to impress your friends now I'm Tim Gettys I can't impress anybody so I'm here with Erick Castro Master bartender to teach you a thing or two happy to be here man thank you very much so here's the deal Erick I'm the pure one everyone at home knows that I like my Mexican Coke what type of drink can I order that tastes like soda cuz I'm not a big alcohol guy this cocktail is called The Naughty Dog The Naughty Dog wow so first start with the glass uhhuh you add 1 oz of Kahlúa and a half of some tasty rum fill this tasty mixture up with some ice m I'm just going to top it off with some root beer arguably the world's greatest beer super easy so far what do you think man too easy I'm super into this yeah then we're going to float a little bit of cream on top floating the cream you want to go it's good to drink right now but I recommend um hit it with a little bit of fresh

I'm super into this, then we're going to float a little bit of cream on top. Floating the cream, you want to go - it's good to drink right now, but I recommend hitting it with a little bit of fresh nutmeg on top. Damn, bam! Tossing that nut up, make like it ain't nothing, right here we have the Naughty Dog. There you go, man. Let me know what you think. Okay, let's do it - that tastes like a root beer float. Now I'm a huge fan of root beer floats; they might be better than soda because they are soda and ice cream, two things I love together in one nice little nutmeg piece of goodness. Go and give it a stir, Stir It Up kind of let all those textures get together and it goes down like a root beer float. Woo! Let's do this - it's too easy. Well, thanks so much, Eric, thanks for having me. If you guys want to check out this man's bars, go to Provisions or the Boiler Maker in San Diego or New York respectively. Also, you got a special deal for us? Yeah, if you'd like me to come up with a craft cocktail made specifically for

"Man's bars go to PLYMOUTH Provisions or The Boilermaker in San Diego or New York, respectively. Also, you got a special deal for us - yeah! If you'd like me to come up with a craft cocktail made specifically for you, go to patreon.com/kindafunnyguys; they will name this drink after you and actually sell it in real bars, that's pretty damn cool. What else is cool is you guys leaving a comment down below letting us know what you think about this video and all the rest of the videos we make - keep coming back to kindofunny.com for a lot more until next time. This guy's Erick Castro; I'm Tim Gettys, and you are awesome."
